name: Cathedral 3-D
description:
Cathedral 3-D - the fast-paced, single-player arena FPS inspired by early 3-D shooters of the nineties. The game places you in an abandoned cathedral in the sky where you will be forced to defend yourself against endless legions of human enemies. As a powerful monster armed with fiery breath and fluid movements you will be forced to fight for your life. But beware, your heart has been locked in the chest and you have to protect it too!

Key gameplay features:

  • Unique gameplay focused around protecting the chest.
  • Fluid movement system with double jumps, strafing, rocket jumping and shotgun flying.
  • Flexible attack system with classic FPS weapon types.
  • Leaderboard that allows you compete with other players around the world.
  • Survive long enough to unlock more.

Engine features:

  • Custom game engine crafted using the dark powers of C programming language.
  • Early software rasterizes look and feel with unfiltered textures and jagged animations.
  • Supports massive amounts of enemies.
  • Handcrafted graphics and sounds.
